record.jsxtip: Fires when the active tab changes.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.

record.jsxtip: Fires after the user drops an object on this tabbed pane.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.
the browser event that triggers this event.
the object where the drag begins.

record.jsxtip: Fires after the user drops an object on this tabbed pane while pressing the Ctrl key.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.
the browser event that triggers this event.
the object where the drag begins.

record.jsxtip: Fires after this tabbed pane is removed from the DOM.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.
the parent of this tabbed pane before it is removed from the DOM.
